title: GDer's Assignments
body:
Zantheus- Make high-quality shitstorms.

ViralVoltage- Make threads about the terrible community and go on small rants on the negativity.

IonCannonKarthus- Post boring shit.

HateDaddy- GD's resident Syndra hater....cuz all of the others left.

Evangele- Make people happy.

LesbianLesbians- shitpost

Krizonar- Updating FEK avis

Lyte- Smite people and get upvotes.

Pendragon- Leader of the Nazi Regime

Kaellrus- Rant on the right OP stuff. He targets the right things.

Critmaster Garen- Orianna hater.

Jikker- GD's Geographer, and leader of the lurkers.

Legal Loli- obv the %%%% leader.

Chaoyo- Ruin everything.

Ireliaswagdesu- Shitpost and talk about Irelia.

GhostCrawler- Piss off all of the melee mains.

xNasusxXxDeathx or w/e your name is- Post Nasus stories.

Mia Bella Volpe(Rock298)- Ahri stuff.

Malygos- The only regular OCE poster GD has.

SharbyQue- Graves stuff.

NobSaiboot- Be the genuinely funny guy.

ManDudeMcDudeMan- GD Boards defender.

AntiSkillshot- Where are you?

DeadlyDuck17- GD Boards Police. Keeps stuff on League.

Sooko- URF guy from EU. Lurks.

GIJose65- If you want an assignment, get that brony FEK out of here.

RIVENONAPRAYER- Riven main.

Hetchy- hmmm, idk

Marenjii- obv a Kaceytron lover.

Only Mid- Brony guy. GROSS.

Drakzul the Dark- Syndra main/hater and an ADC main. He doesn't need a job guys. He's probably diagnosed with cancer.

Wanfear- Leader of the Perfect Ascension guys.

Arduno- Veigar main I'm guessing. Mehehe

Midnightstabs- <_< that name...

Hero of Ideals- Funny lurker guy. You have to do funny lurker stuff.

Phane Sorter- A disgrace to GD. Nothing.

M Shumacher- Get back to making those threads. THAT'S YOUR ONE ND ONLY JOB HERE

Talont- Lurk Army soldier.

ILovePhaneSorter- No

Sadistic Lulu- GD's Lulu crepo.

Ouroboro- A funny ghost of old GD. And a Garen main. Your job is to fulfill the quest of DFGaren.

Kroznick- Zac lover.

Soldrart- Some guy. Lurk Army Captain.

AnAggravatedPimp- Another Riven main. Nice guy.

Maximum Riven- Hated by GD. Loved by GeeDeers. You're aight in my book man.

Knalxz- Genuine poster.

Rule34- He used to have a great slideshow on his FEK. Now his job is to just be the most boring person here.

FreezerFlare- Ayyy lmao

RexSaur- Thread critic.

Menea6587- Needs to up the post count.

Dryad Soraka- OMFG SORKA HFUGF#UBWFKUEGFU
